subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Kyle Edmund, an unheralded British tennis player, will make his Davis Cup debut in the finals on Friday when he is scheduled to face David Goffin in the opening match of the team contest in Ghent, Belgium.
snippet: Kyle Edmund, an unheralded British tennis player, will make his Davis Cup debut in the finals on Friday when he is scheduled to face David Goffin in the opening match of the team contest in Ghent, Belgium.
